description: A small pillow with a decorative design.
A racecar shaped pillow to rest your head on when sleeping.
A woolly pillow to rest your head on when sleeping.
A cushion used on a chair. It would still be comfy enough to rest your head.
A plushie modelled after a popular video game character. Its pink, round, and soft.

name: overly long body pillow
description: A massive pillow with a print of an anime snake lady on the front and their scantily clad version on the back.

name: dragon girl body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of a small anime dragon girl on the front, and the same dragon but nude on the back. If this was pre-cataclysm, you could hear the police coming.

name: harpy body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of an anime bird girl on the front, and the same harpy but nude on the back.

name: mermaid body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of an anime fish girl on the front, and the same mermaid but nude on the back.

name: wizard body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of an cute anime mage in black and red robes, and the same wizard but nude on the back.

name: goddess body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of a blue-haired anime girl on the front, and the same girl but nude on the back.

name: tanuki body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of an anthro tanuki girl on the front, and the same girl but nude on the back.

name: blonde angel body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of a blonde angelic girl on the front, and the same girl, nude, on the back.

name: gothic angel body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of a gothic angel girl on the front, and the same girl, nude, on the back.

name: spider body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of a demonic spider on the front, and the same spider but nude on the back. The pillow smells strangely of miscellaneous drugs.

name: M2 Browning body pillow
description: A massive body pillow, printed with an m2 Browning for some reason. What sort of degenerate would sleep with one of these?.

name: survivor body pillow
description: A massive body-sized pillow, made of kevlar. It is printed with an anime girl on it, and a scantily clad version on the rear.

name: bunny body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of an anthro bunny on the front, with an exceptionally detailed open mouth. On the back, is the same bunny, but from behind, nude, and a lot pudgier.

name: indescribable body pillow
description: A big, body-sized pillow with a print of a strange brown-and-yellow creature on the front, and the same creature on the back, from behind. She looks kind of like a bee... sphinx... thing.

name: Bean Plushie
description: This is a talking plushie, round and plump. Its soft, but something feels wrong here.
